description.value:
You have learned how to create perpetual alchemical infusions that can provide a near-infinite supply of certain simple items.

You gain the ability to create two 1st-level alchemical items using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Quick Alchemy]{Quick Alchemy} without spending a batch of infused reagents. The items you can select depend on your research field and must be in your formula book.

Choose two of the following formulas:

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Acid Flask (Lesser)]{Acid Flask (Lesser)},
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Alchemist's Fire (Lesser)]{Alchemist's Fire (Lesser)},
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Bottled Lightning (Lesser)]{Bottled Lightning (Lesser)},
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Frost Vial (Lesser)]{Frost Vial (Lesser)},
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Tanglefoot Bag (Lesser)]{Tanglefoot Bag (Lesser)}, or
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Thunderstone (Lesser)]{Thunderstone (Lesser)}.
